search.title: Smart Search
search.subtitle: Access your organization's network of technical knowledge assets.
search.engine_desc: Our system privately processes thousands of technical documentation fragments for your organization. We use Gemini 2.0 to synthesize answers based exclusively on your assets, maintaining full traceability to the original source.
search.privacy_desc: Your searches and documents are isolated by Tenant. No other organization can access your queries or the results generated by the AI engine.

caseWorkflow.iaDescription: The system can automatically analyze documentation for this state.

roi.accuracy_desc: Fidelity of automated extractions vs manual reviews.
roi.cost_basis: *Based on an average cost of $50/hour per technician and engineer.
roi.no_data: No ROI data available for this period.

view.dual_desc: This chunk allows finding the original document by searching in Spanish, even if the manual is German/English.

brain.title: Technical Intelligence Assistant
brain.description: Perform complex technical queries. Our AI will search manuals, verify the accuracy of the information and give you a high-fidelity response.
brain.placeholder: e.g., Rescue protocol in Otis 2000 manual?
brain.investigating_desc: Retrieving documents, validating against hallucinations and drafting a solution.

torque.title: Query Torque

relevance.label: Answer Relevance
relevance.desc: Does the response really solve the technical doubt?

precision.label: Context Precision

bulk.encoding_help: Ensure the CSV file uses UTF-8 encoding.
